actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Rice (NY) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A024) offered by Miss Rice (NY) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Miss Rice (NY) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require states to strengthen graduated driver's licensing requirements to be eligible for State Graduated Driver Licensing Incentive Grants.
purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require states to strengthen graduated driver's licensing requirements to be eligible for State Graduated Driver Licensing Incentive Grants.
